name: On The Wind (itch) (Caltaylor101, brightbone, MeronSan)
description:
This game was made for the Lost Relic Game Jam, and will most likely not continue development.

It is a game about the journey of a dandelion seed to someone's lawn.

Use W to float

A and D for moving left and right

S to float and slow down

Click and drag from the top of the screen, then release to force yourself back.

Press escape to restart or quit. 

Credits:

Cody Night - Programmer

Leo Ryoo - Programmer

Jesse Marion - Artist

Brightbone - Audio
